<h1 align="center">
  NYC Coders
</h1>
<h2 align="center">Black Lives Matter Hackathon</h2>

<p>This Portfolio contains all the amazing projects that were made over the course of the NYC Coders' Black Lives Matter Hackathon. This amazing event had over 150 developers,designers and project managers come together to work towards building projects to help advance the cause of the Black Lives Matter movement</p>

<g>If you participated in the hackathon and want your project featured please add your project information to the google doc in the slack channel.</p>
